description.value: These metal restraints can bind a Small or Medium creature. To escape the manacles, a creature must use their action to make a successful [[/check dexterity 20]] check or break them with a successful [[/check strength 20]] check. Each set of manacles comes with one key. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves’ tools can pick the manacles’ lock with a successful [[/check dexterity 15]] check. Manacles are an object with AC 19 and 15 hit points.
